heading: Welcome
text: Welcome seminar! site hosts materials: syllabus, slides, R code, datasets, weekly exercises.Tip: Use left sidebar navigate across classes materials.

heading: 0.1 How this site is organized
text: Syllabus course policies scheduleClass pages (Class 01, Class 02, …) slides, notes, codeAssignments deadlines upload linksDatasets ready downloadAbout contact creditTo build site locally, open R run:publish GitHub Pages, push repo set Pages serve /docs folder (see instructions ).

heading: Syllabus
text: University: European University ViadrinaSemester: Winter 2025/26Instructor: Renan Magalhães (magalhaes@kelso-institute-europe.de)

heading: Overview
text: seminar introduces basic econometric methods R hands-work using FinSESCo dataset.

heading: Grading
text: Participation: 20%Weekly exercises: 40%Final mini‑project: 40%

heading: Policies
text: Late work: see Assignments pageCollaboration: discuss freely; submit work

heading: R & RStudio Basics - Overview
code:
x <- 1:10
summary(x)##    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
##    1.00    3.25    5.50    5.50    7.75   10.00
plot(x, x^2, main = "Sanity check", pch = 19)

heading: Code demo
code:
library(dplyr)

starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Droid") %>%
  select(name, height, mass) %>%
  arrange(desc(height))

heading: Exercise
text: Exercise 03: download RmdUpload via Assignments page.

heading: Overview
text: Today introduce ordinary least squares (OLS), interpreting coefficients, basic diagnostics.

heading: Slides
text: Download slides

heading: Code Lab
code:
fit <- lm(mpg ~ disp + hp, data = mtcars)
summary(fit)## 
## Call:
## lm(formula = mpg ~ disp + hp, data = mtcars)
## 
## Residuals:
##     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
## -4.7945 -2.3036 -0.8246  1.8582  6.9363 
## 
## Coefficients:
##              Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
## (Intercept) 30.735904   1.331566  23.083  < 2e-16 ***
## disp        -0.030346   0.007405  -4.098 0.000306 ***
## hp          -0.024840   0.013385  -1.856 0.073679 .  
## ---
## Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
## 
## Residual standard error: 3.127 on 29 degrees of freedom
## Multiple R-squared:  0.7482, Adjusted R-squared:  0.7309 
## F-statistic: 43.09 on 2 and 29 DF,  p-value: 2.062e-09

plot(m)
